build I20040323-0800

While refactoring some code, the editor wasn't always updating the red squiggles.
Steps were typically like:
- wanted to move some code in a method m from WorkbenchWindow to
PerspectiveBarManager
- cut old code in m
- type perspectiveBar.m(...)
- use Ctrl+1 to create m in PerspectiveBarManager
- paste the code into the new m in PerspectiveBarManager and fix it up
- Ctrl+F6 to switch back to WorkbenchWindow
- it still complains about PerspectiveBarManager.m being undefined
- type a character
- the error gets cleared
